leaderBg: Leads credit analysis and underwriting team at Gulf Coast Business Credit. Key decision-maker for underwriting automation and credit assessment tools across the GCBC operation.

NJIT BS, NYU MBA (Entrepreneurial Studies, 2014-2017). Founded Spartan Capital in Middletown, NY in 2015. Bootstrapped to $10M+/month originations with zero VC funding. Capital-efficient operator. Featured on deBanked TV (Ep 55). Profiled by FunderIntel as 'The Spartan Way.' Hudson Valley's #1 small business financing provider.
Appointed April 2025. Previously CFO at Hugo Insurance. Former VP Finance at Fora Financial where they originated $1B+. Understands unit economics deeply.
Appointed May 2025. Previously underwriting manager at Forward Financing. Data-driven approach. Has evaluated AI tools before. Key buyer for underwriting technology.
NYC metro area based. Manages broker/ISO relationships and sales organization for Spartan Capital.
Drexel University. Leads brand and growth strategy. Represented Spartan at Broker Fair 2025.
Business Development at Peak Finance in Woodland Hills, CA, a mortgage financing company offering conforming and non-conforming lending solutions. Handles BD and operations at Likety.
Runs day-to-day operations at United Capital Source. Limited public information available on background and career history.
Leads marketing strategy and brand positioning for United Capital Source. Limited public information available â€” may have since departed the company.
Drives strategic initiatives and business development partnerships at United Capital Source. Note: UCS management team lists Lacey Bende as Controller.
Won IFA NEXGEN Rookie of the Year award for outstanding contributions to the factoring industry. At CapFlow since October 2022. Represents company at IFA conferences alongside CEO Andrew Coon.
CFO of both CapFlow Funding Group and CFG Merchant Solutions. Forbes Finance Council member. Controls financial operations across both entities.
CIO of both CapFlow and CFG Merchant Solutions. Previously CEO of AllTrust Networks and COO of Treater. Technical decision-maker for both entities.

Leads Bridgeport Capital Services, the Coral Springs, FL factoring company established in 1999. Oversees all operations and strategic direction for the company which generated $9.6M in annual revenue in 2025. Specializes in AR factoring for small to medium-sized businesses.
President of Bridgeport Capital Services. Runs day-to-day operations. Helps refine underwriting for factoring clients. Family business operation alongside CEO Mark Rosenstein.
Manages ISO partnerships and broker channel at Fratello Capital through the dedicated underwriting portal (fratellocapitalportal.com). Front-line contact for deal flow.

25+ years in financial services. Villanova University economics. Held institutional trading positions at Lehman Brothers for 13 years (1991-2004) in Fixed Income Division, including senior trader on high grade credit and commercial paper desks. Director in Fixed Income at Barclays Capital heading front-end high grade corporate bond trading. Managing Director at Hudson Castle Group. Accepted into Forbes Business Council December 2024. Co-founded CFGMS in 2015.
CFO since CFGMS founding in 2015. Forbes Finance Council member. Manages financial operations as company funded $500M+ through ISOs in 2024.
Previously CEO of AllTrust Networks. Former COO of Treater. Specialist in launching tech-driven businesses. Technical decision-maker for CFGMS.
Ex-Bloomberg LP (Team Leader). Daily user of underwriting tools. Demo the product to him for endorsement.
Manages financial operations and reporting at Rowan Advance. Key operational decision-maker in the family-run business. Oversees finance for the 200-person organization.

Progressed from VP ISO Relations to Head of Business Development, ISO Department at BizFund. Based in Miami (305 area code). Previously VP of Business Development at US MED Capital, an industry leader in healthcare small business financing. Manages strategic ISO partnerships, broker relationships, and underwriting communication to expand networks. Contact: 305-785-8564.
Manages day-to-day ISO broker relationships and deal flow at BizFund. Part of the ISO department handling partner communications and submissions.

Hofstra University Finance degree. Leads 800Funding's overall strategy from Miami, FL (20200 W Dixie Hwy). Emphasizes technology-driven efficiency in small business funding powered by artificial intelligence and advanced data analytics. Company offers MCA, invoice factoring, PO funding, and AR lines of credit.

Founded Funding Metrics LLC in 2013. Built proprietary risk models combined with real-time cash flow data. Analytics-first approach to merchant cash advance. Parent company operates Lendini and QuickFix Capital brands. Secured $100M revolving credit facility in 2020. $500M+ funded to 9,500+ businesses in all 50 states.
Runs day-to-day operations at Funding Metrics alongside Chairman Frascella. Key operational decision-maker for both Lendini and QuickFix Capital brands.
Works on proprietary risk models and analytics at Funding Metrics. Technical decision-influencer. Deep ML and data pipeline expertise. Part of the Frascella family that founded the company.
Manages ISO relationships for Lendini. Part of the founding Frascella family. Focused on faster approvals through technology for ISO partners.

Co-founded Last Chance Funding (LCF) in 2011 on Long Island, NY. Has seen triple-digit growth year after year since founding. Led the acquisition of Reliant Funding's strategic assets and licensing rights in September 2023, creating a multi-brand funder serving subprime (LCF) and prime (Reliant) merchants. Company now headquartered at 3000 Marcus Ave, New Hyde Park, NY with approximately 75 employees.

15+ year finance career. Previously Senior VP at DFC Global Corporation, VP & Global Treasurer at Tronox, and Associate VP at NASDAQ. Joined Reliant Funding as CFO in 2020, serving 3.5 years before transitioning to COO. Now oversees day-to-day operations of the Reliant division under the LCF Group umbrella.
